function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective ventilation systems and air purifiers","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, CO2 sensors","People":"Building facility managers, occupants","Owner":"Building facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of optimal layouts for physical distancing","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and inability to maintain physical distance","Mitigation":"Reconfiguration of layouts, installation of barriers, and scheduling occupancy","Technologies":"Space planning software, physical barriers, occupancy scheduling tools","People":"Building facility managers, occupants","Owner":"Building facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for occupant health in building design","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality and increased risk of occupant health issues","Mitigation":"Integration of health-conscious design principles, use of eco-friendly materials","Technologies":"Sustainable building materials, biophilic design elements","People":"Building designers, architects","Owner":"Building designers, building owners"}]}
